text: The 2015 Aspria Tennis Cup was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the tenth edition of the tournament which was part of the 2015 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Milan, Italy, between 20 and 28 June 2015. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Benoit Paire |67 |1 |- | |Federico Delbonis |80 |2 |- | |Blaž Kavčič |91 |3 |- | |Marco Cecchinato |126 |4 |- | |Andrey Golubev |135 |5 |- | |Laslo Djere |187 |6 |- | |Ramkumar Ramanathan |208 |7 |- | |Filippo Volandri |230 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of June 15, 2015. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Filippo Baldi * Gianluigi Quinzi * Pietro Licciardi * Gianluca Mager The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Benoît Paire * Rogério Dutra Silva * Flavio Cipolla * Laslo Đere The following player received entry as special exempt: * Calvin Hemery * José Checa-Calvo ==Doubles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Nicolas Barrientos | |Sergio Galdos |241 |1 |- | |Flavio Cipolla | |Andrey Golubev |318 |2 |- | |James Cluskey | |David O'Hare |407 |3 |- | |Patrick Grigoriu | |Ramkumar Ramanathan |473 |4 |} *1 Rankings as of June 15, 2015. ===Other entrants=== The following pairs received wildcards into the doubles main draw: * Davide Carpi / Stefano Mezzadri * Filippo Baldi / Gianluigi Quinzi * Alessandro Giannessi / Pietro Licciardi ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Federico Delbonis def. Rogério Dutra Silva, 6–1, 7–6(8–6). ===Doubles=== * Nikola Mektić / Antonio Šančić def. Christian Garin / Juan Carlos Saez, 6–3, 6–4. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Aspria Tennis Cup Category:Aspria Tennis Cup
title: 2015 Aspria Tennis Cup
